• Main Page
Step counter
BMA400

Step counter feature.

bma400_set_step_counter_param

int8_t bma400_set_step_counter_param(uint8_t *sccr_conf, const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to set the step counter's configuration parameters from the registers 0x59 to 0x71.
Parameters
[in]sccr_conf: sc config parameter
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError / failure

bma400_get_steps_counted

int8_t bma400_get_steps_counted(uint32_t *step_count, uint8_t *activity_data, const struct bma400_dev *dev);
This API is used to get the step counter output in form of number of steps in the step_count value.
Parameters
[out]step_count: Number of step counts
[out]activity_data: Activity data WALK/STILL/RUN
[in]dev: Structure instance of bma400_dev.
activity_data Status
0x00 BMA400_STILL_ACT
0x01 BMA400_WALK_ACT
0x02 BMA400_RUN_ACT
Returns
Result of API execution status.
Return values
ZeroSuccess
PostiveWarning
NegativeError
